caption: Marie's 2 was closed for awhile, but as of today is open for business, Monday April 5 2021, great food and friendly staff,check it out in Saint George Staten island, r&r.

This place is the one I like best. I go to many restaurants but here I keep coming back again and again. The team is very welcoming and the cuisine they offer is so good. I am always happy to have a good dinner here. I recommend this place with pleasure.

A group of friends and I stumbled upon the restaurant by chance.. & let me just say, I’m planning another trip to New York specifically for this restaurant! Probably the best pasta I’ve had in the country! Cannot wait to return!
Oooh my God!!! This place!!! Had pastrami on a pretzel roll!!!! THE SKY OPENED UP AND LOVE POURED DOWN!!!!
Great bartenders! Good eats!
Delicious food. Great atmosphere and the staff are very friendly
A nice little place to get a quality slice of pizza and a brew to go with. Nice people there too.
Lovely little place. Amazing food. With good friendly service
Such lovely people and a cosy interior!!! Soups are fantastic!!
Small but Cozy.... Delicious Pizza....
Came here for the vodka pizza and was not disappointed. Amazing flavor. Staff is courteous and sweet. Place is super affordable.
Good local place,staff is great and food and prices are good.

Lovely place in the Island near the ferry. I would go back here every time I’m in the area. So many choices also with healthy food.  Oh and their liquor is really good. $15 per drink and it’s worth it. Had the Joy Martini it was delicious!!
Beautiful, tasty and fair-priced :)

Decided to stop in for some pizza after riding the Staten Island Ferry, and boy, what a treat! My husband and I split the 10 inch margarita pizza with pepperoni for lunch. It was amazing. We would seriously take the ferry again, …
Food is great and the pasta bowls are HUGE so definitely better to share. The only downside is that the pizza is only thin crust
Very cozy diner!
This place is my number one site.  Of all restaurants I know I favor it most. I always suggests to my friends to go to visit this restaurant.
Delicious coffee delicious pizza Awesome restaurant delicious everything
We had lovely pizzas in this quaint and sympathetic place just on walking distance from the Staten Island Ferry.
Nice size portions...
Small, intimate, great thin crust pizza, good Italian food, very friendly service.
Excellent calzone and pizza. Wish they had more seating. Excellent staff. Can't say enough about the food.☆☆☆☆☆
Small restaurant near the St. George Theater offering deliciously prepared food served by personable and helpful staff members.

Small, friendly place. Food is very good, larger portions, with enough of a twist to be different, interesting, and delicious but familiar. Mixed drinks follow suit,v try them all. Thin crust, crisp but cheesey pizza is a family favorite.

The Best Pizza, Soup and Burgers. The atmosphere is warm and creative. I love the community minded space on the walls for local artists. The Staff is friendly and they make you feel at home. The menu never fails me. Whatever i order it never disappoints!
The sauce was great
Excellent menu!!! Exquisite taste!!!!!!
Looked like a bar more than a restaurant.
Excellent pizza, great taste.
Awesome diner. Very polite service and nice food. Good wines.
Excellent, delicious food, great service during a busy period!!
FAB
Great food
Cute place, friendly staff, good beer
Great food and cool beers! Small and quiet- just what we needed after a busy day of sightseeing! Right off the ferry.

I'm a frequent customer here and the staff is always very nice to me (and easy on the eyes). The food is fantastic and the place is very clean. I always feel welcome here and I have no problem supporting this pizzeria.
Very sorry to say, but it was the worst pizza i have had in a long time.

Wonderful place! I'm surprised with how quiet it was. It was a short walk from the ferry, and incredibly tasty! The pizza was great! I usually don't like pizza because the sauce makes the dough all soggy, but this place put the sauce on top of the cheese! Everything we ordered was great! The blackened tuna was also especially good :)
Awesome place for lunch  CLEAN Great service Great prices Staff is nice too and very clean. Will definitely be back. Food is great
Best pizza I ever had.
Was looking forward to eating here. Had lunch and was not disappointed. Superb.

Overcharged me. I ordered $20+15=$35 and was charged $44.41 before tip.  Update -- The owner replied to my review and said the $44.41 included tip, which means the store added tip without letting customer know and then asked for tip again!
Perfect seafood trio, shrimps Parmigiano.
The food is fabulous!
Great place for a salad, sandwich, burger, pizza, meal....great place for anything on the menu. Wonderful spot at any time of the day! Staff is always friendly and helpful!
Delicious food
Pizza is the best we had in NYC.

Very cosy place with great friendly service. Prices are reasonable and the food is good. We had the philli cheese steak sandwich which was good but could be even better - there should be some kind of spread/sauce (mayo or other) on the …
Very good burgers and clean restaurant with friendly fast service!
The food is absolutely incredible, great atmosphere, excellent service! It's a block from the Staten Island Ferry terminal, east to get to from Manhattan too!
Best pizza in us
Small and cosy. Nice food, affordable prices, what do you need more on your day trip to Staten Island.
Came from Bayonne NJ had the best Pizza and roll in my Life
Superb pizza
Good pie

OodAte here twice in a row while at a training. Both meals were very good, but a little over priced. Environment was relaxed. Since it's a small restaurant it can take a little time to get food so make sure to plan accordingly.

Great spot for a quick slice or a sit down meal. Staff is super friendly and their pizza is to die for! Try the grandma slice if you’re there! Plus it’s walking distance from the new outlets and the ferry!

Was visiting NYC for the weekend and tried Marie's after hopping off the Staten Island Ferry and glad we did.  Pizza was delicious and they had Kills Boro Brewing Dope double IPA the combination of which made for an awesome lunch.  The waitress was super cool too...
Wonderful little business with great pizza and welcoming ambience. The owner Mario is delightful.
Highly customize your own pasta dish. Numerous toppings to choose from. Worth the ferry ride just for it.

This has to be one of the best if not the best Italian restaurant in New York. My pasta dish was fantastic and so was my friends pizza. Portions are very generous and it’s all very reasonably priced. Staff was very friendly and I really liked their music selection too. Highly recommend it!

This is the place to go. Stephanie, from 🇬🇧 will serve you the best possible pizza ever. Together with the rest of the team they are amazing. Be prepared to take pizza home 😂😂😂. It looks tiny, but inside it's like "A whole, new world". Still tiny, tho but tickles your taste buds. Thanks guys 😘
(Translated by Google) Really delicious here and not too expensive. We liked it very much.  (Original) Wirklich sehr lecker hier und nicht zu teuer. Hat uns sehr gut gefallen.
Gray food and huge portions !
I was surprised how good was the pizza. Very delicious pie. I order classic or cheese pizza. Very good one with thin crust. Yummy

We stopped in at Marie's for a late lunch after taking the Staten Island Ferry. The location is so convenient and close to the terminal.  The restaurant is cosy and authentic. The service was fantastic, and the menu is full of delicious food.  Check out my wife's salad!
Me & My Lady love to come here. It has a quaint nook that we always sit at, the service is great and the food is excellent.
My favorite take out eat in. Great staff and the food is delish.
Amazing food, lovely service. Honestly some of the best good we had in NY. And the coffee was good too!
Delicious food and lovely wait staff. Best meal we had in New York!
The closest pizza to what I had in Naples since I was there. It was really great.

Great place: nice environment, good price for portions, and the staff was friendly. The steak was well cooked, though need a bit seasoning, but the short wait made it worth while(the seasoning just needed a bit more salt - for me)
Best food in town
Great Italian restaurant, small but great environment and staff!

I hate to give this review, because the woman serving us was so nice, but my food was not so great and looked disgusting. I hadn't eaten since breakfast and it was 8:30pm when my daughter and I walked by this quaint restaurant. The art and …
Great Italian food on Staten Island. Was worth a ferry trip over.
Ok but too expensive

This is an amazing place! I go at least once a week. The food is wonderful, and the atmosphere is so comfortable and inviting. They play great music, it’s inexpensive, and  I have recommended it to all my friends. Now they are regulars too!!
Great pizza and a very nice atmosphere. Had a nice conversation with the owner and another with a customer. I will definitely be back.

Coffee was really not great. At $7 for a cappuccino it was both the most expensive and worst coffee I’ve had in New York.  Doesn’t really look like much of a coffee spot though. Beer selection and pizzas looked pretty good so stick to those.

Stumbled across this place while visiting Manhattan after disembarking on the Staten Island side of the ferry. Ordered a 10" Amici pizza made with fresh mozzarella,  caramelized onions, ricotta and thinly sliced prosciutto. Perfectly …
(Translated by Google) Very tasty and good  (Original) Très goûteux et bon
(Translated by Google) Nice atmosphere. Calmly, at home. The food is delicious, the staff is great  (Original) Хорошая атмосфера. Спокойно, по-домашнему. Готовят вкусно, персонал отличный
Amazing Italian food such as pizzas and calzones, plus it’s reasonably priced for NYC so good for ballin on a budget
We had a delicious dinner.  I went for the salad but my kids had the specials.

(Translated by Google) It is tiny. There is food to go or take there. A lot of. Large servings. Very good. I couldn't finish eating everything.  (Original) Es pequeñito. Hay comida para llevar o tomar alli. Mucha cantidad. Raciones grandes. Muy bueno. No podia acabar de comer todo.
Family friendly, very personable towards all customers.  Great waitering and waitressing.  Fast delivery.  💝

Stumbled upon this place on a walk through the city. It was pretty calm with only a few customers. Once we got in there was someone ready to greet us like a friend she was expecting. I ordered one of the specialty pizzas and I gotta say, …

(Translated by Google) Of course you sailed for free with the Staten Island Ferry past the Statue of Liberty. But what should you do in Staten Island now ??? Well, if you are hungry, Marie's 2 is the ultimate recommendation. Food for the …
Friendly neighborhood restaurant Out standing Staff  And great food From pizza to stakes
good food small place

(Translated by Google) Excellent in all respects: setting, service, atmosphere, lunch ... top notch! We ordered 2 burgers with your choice of fries or salad garnish: do not expect a few seasoned leaves, but a large bowl of varied raw …
Excellent as always.
My favorite in the neighborhood.
Great service! Friendly staff. Best Burgers we’ve had in NY. Went there twice on our ny-trip. Would recommend!
The food was awesome the cook & waitress was very nice and they make ur food anyway to please you got to get back for the creamy pasto was delicious 🍕🍝
Some of the best food in town.
THE FOOD IS GREAT!! I LOVE GINAS HOMEMADE NATURAL TEAS!!! They are FAMILY!!! Love THEM!!! I always send tourists to Marie's 2!!! I'm soo HAPPY THEY ARE IN MY NEIGHBORHOOD!!!
Looks are deceiving but there are comfy booths inside that make for an awesome meal, the food is amazing!
Nice people, good burgers, good prices
Very good food

Excellent!! My wife, friend and I truly enjoyed the food and management. Their white pie was delicious, as was the mescilin salad with blackened salmon. My wife loved the linguini with meat sauce. Thanks Gina and Joe! David from New Jersey
Everything here is great. The staff is awesome.  dine in or takeout both great experiences
Delish! The owner even gave me cough drops because I wasnt feeling well <3 Wonderful Service, I'd eat here everyday
Tasty. Great Prices. Great service.
Great portions and tasty food!
They give free pizza to the homeless
Very good salads and pizzas.
2nd time here. So amazed by the first I had to come back to see if they could could wow me again. Without fail, they did!  Food was phenomenal. Casual atmosphere great for fam night.
A place that feels like home. The food is amazing, the vibe is great, everyone is friendly... What else more could you want?
Great people, good food. Always feel welcomed and nothing but positive vibes.

The food is good, the service is good, but on a normal day. My experience (or at least my friend's experience) has proven to be against the average customer's. My friend is disabled, making him the target of unwanted attention, however this …

5 stars to the crew, started with artichoke hearts oreganata and it was , like our President Trump would say BEAUTIFUL,  then moved on to Amici pizza and it was the best thin crust pizza I've had in years, would rival ANY brick oven pizza
Visiting NYC from NC. Stopped in for lunch while waiting for the ferry. Excellent service. Delicious pizza. Laid back atmosphere.

Awesome place, tucked in a hole in the wall. Excellent food and service, waitress even ran next door to grab an orange slice for the beer. Highly recommend, good prices and not too crowded for a Saturday.
Delicious food and perfect service! Don’t miss the Apple pizza. Thanks Marie

We always make it a point to take the ferry across and visit Staten Island. This was such a great find today and away from the Manhattan tourists (like ourselves). Exceptional food and exceptional service at such awesome prices. We had a …
username: Branding For Entertainers with Billy Diamond

caption: Good,  authentic food, reasonably prized

This place is an amazing addition to the neighborhood dining places.  It is small but they won't keep you waiting long.  The menu is amazing!  The ahi tuna avocado appetizer is a necessity.  It is a generous portion for sharing.  And the parmigian sandwiches will have you STUFFED!  Enjoy and let's keep this awesome place thriving!!
Margherita pizza is delish.  Friendly staff.
Marie's is comfortable and cozy. I'm always welcomed by the friendly faces of the owners and staff. Food is delicious and fresh! Definitely worth checking out.
Really good food had the California Burger
Great food and service

(Translated by Google) Small place. Nice people. I ate ina piza that was very burned. Bad taste. Under the table very dirty. The juices are good but would not go back again.  (Original) Lugar pequeño. Gente amable. Comi ina piza que estaba muy quemada. Mal sabor. Bajo la mesa muy sucio. Los jugos son bueno pero no regresaria nuevamente.
Great food, comfy decor and exceptional service! Highly recommended
Food was good, near the ferry
Okay food. Nice service
